scripts.test: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libgtk2.0-0 libgtk-3-0 libgbm-dev libnotify-dev libgconf-2-4 libnss3 libxss1 libasound2 libxtst6 xauth xvfb && NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service test:e2e --headless --env PORT=8080

comments.mode test and cypress: mode test has a special meaning in vue
comments.mode test and cypress_2: buildpack sets NODE_ENV test in test step
comments.cypress: dependency needed by heroku build pack
comments.cypress_2: It does not pass cypress from build to test
comments.cypress_3: So cypress install is needed for tests
